Hi Ilja, 

> > I am not a Microsoft basher any more, but I still believe that 
> > SourceSafe is actually /worse/ than no version control. I feel 
> > similarly about ClearCase, although not as strongly.
> 
> I don't like SourceSafe at all, but in my experience, it's 
> that little bit better than no version control at all that it 
> might make sense using it if there are no other options.

If I have to use it, I try to get everyone to turn off the
VisualStudio IDE integration, in favor of explicitly checking
files in and out as needed.

Charlie
